settings.content: It is possible to make breaking changes to your site here. Do not edit these settings unless you're absolutely sure of what you're doing.

settings.label: Primary Domain
settings.info: Enter the domain of the primary site -- the one that all users should see by default

settings.label: Secondary Domain
settings.info: Enter the domain of the secondary site -- the one that only users from certain countries should see

settings.label: This Site is the Primary Site
settings.info: Check this box if this site is the primary site

settings.label: Site Country Code
settings.info: Enter the Country Code of this site (example: CA)

settings.label: Secondary site Country Codes
settings.info: Enter a comma-separated list of the country codes that should redirect to the secondary site (example: FR,UK,BG)

settings.label: Redirect to Root
settings.info: Check this box if you want to redirect to the site root, instead of the corresponding page a user might be on

settings.label: Fallback Delay
settings.info: Enter the delay (in ms) before fallback kicks in

settings.label: Enable Store Switcher
settings.info: Check if you want to enable a store switcher on your site

settings.content: *The following settings are required when the Store Switcher in enabled

settings.label: Primary Site Country Code
settings.info: Enter the Country Code for the Primary Site

settings.label: Primary Site Name
settings.info: Enter the Name you wish to use for the Primary Site (this will appear on the Store Switcher)

settings.label: Secondary Site Country Code
settings.info: Enter the Country Code for the Secondary Site

settings.label: Secondary Site Name
settings.info: Enter the Name you wish to use for the Secondary Site (this will appear on the Store Switcher)

settings.label: Site Cookie Name
settings.info: Enter the cookie name to be used for this site's store switcher
